Uses of Package
net.sourceforge.jiu.color

Packages that use net.sourceforge.jiu.color
net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs Provides classes to read images from and save them to files (or streams) in various file formats.  
net.sourceforge.jiu.color.conversion Classes to improve the results of color reduction algorithms.  
 

Classes in net.sourceforge.jiu.color used by net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs
YCbCrIndex
          This interface simply provides three integer constants as index values for the three channels of an YCbCr image: gray, blue chrominance and red chrominance.
 

Classes in net.sourceforge.jiu.color used by net.sourceforge.jiu.color.conversion
YCbCrIndex
          This interface simply provides three integer constants as index values for the three channels of an YCbCr image: gray, blue chrominance and red chrominance.
